title: Starting a new blog
content:
I haven't thought to use this feature before. I don't know how well read it will be if at all. It seems as though a very different crowd uses the blogs compared to the forums. I have been effectively blogging my font design projects in Typophile's Critique forum. Here are links to the ones I can remember, in no particular order:

- [Effluent](http://web.archive.org/web/20130622071516/http:/typophile.com/node/51416)
- [Palormak](http://web.archive.org/web/20130622071516/http:/typophile.com/node/28416)
- [Agamemnon](http://web.archive.org/web/20130622071516/http:/typophile.com/node/41105)
- [Cartmeign](http://web.archive.org/web/20130622071516/http:/typophile.com/node/28380)
- [Rutaban](http://web.archive.org/web/20130622071516/http:/typophile.com/node/34370)
- [CaliGrot](http://web.archive.org/web/20130622071516/http:/typophile.com/node/51081)
- [Gohan](http://web.archive.org/web/20130622071516/http:/typophile.com/node/34899)
- [Triangulor](http://web.archive.org/web/20130622071516/http:/typophile.com/node/28175)
- [Gohan Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130622071516/http:/typophile.com/node/39907)
- [Posterony](http://web.archive.org/web/20130622071516/http:/typophile.com/node/39145)
- [Antherton Cloister](http://web.archive.org/web/20130622071516/http:/typophile.com/node/28191)

Anyway, here I am! I'll post here about my design work from time to time.
author: cuttlefish
